alert.note: Alert for Northern Middlesex; Northern New London (Connecticut) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS New York City - Upton (Long Island and New York City)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued September 09 at 5:54PM EDT by NWS New York City - Upton
info.description: ...STRONG THUNDERSTORMS WILL IMPACT CENTRAL NEW LONDON AND CENTRAL MIDDLESEX COUNTIES THROUGH 630 PM EDT... At 554 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from Salem to near Sterling. Movement was northeast at 10 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 30 mph and pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor hail damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Jewett City, Norwich, Colchester, Salem, East Lyme, Ledyard, Griswold, East Haddam, Lebanon, Preston, Lisbon, Sprague, Bozrah, Voluntown, and Lyme. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...30 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Torrential rainfall is also occurring with these storms and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.
